abilities.name: Grim Determination
abilities.rule: While this unit contains an **OFFICER**, you can target this unit with Stratagems even while it is Battle-shocked and Orders issued to this unit do not cease to affect this unit if it becomes Battle-shocked.

abilities.name: Servo-scribes
abilities.rule:

abilities.name: Master Vox
abilities.rule: Each time the **OFFICER** in the bearer‚Äôs unit issues an Order, it can issue it to an eligible unit up to 24" away.

abilities.name: Regimental Standard
abilities.rule: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer‚Äôs unit.
